name: Broken Axe
description: A extremely worn axe that is held together by a bit of twine. It feels like the head could snap off at any moment.

name: Old Axe
description: An old axe that has definitely seen better day, but at least it still works.

name: Reliable Axe
description: An brand new axe that can reliably chop down wood.

name: Sharp Axe
description: An axe that was sharpened by an experienced blacksmith.

name: Steel Axe
description: Made out of high-grade steel, this axe can shop down trees very efficiently.

name: Pristine Axe
description: This axe is composed of some of the best material known to man, and it shows.

name: Impeccable Axe
description: Forged by the best blacksmiths known to man, this axe cuts wood like butter.

name: Perfect Axe
description: Nobody has every seen an axe this strong! It seems to have a faint magic-like glow around it.

name: Forest's Doom
description: Who made this and where did it come from? Who knows! With one big swing, this axe fells entire forests.
